mutants.code:
def reverse_subarray(arr, n, l, r):
    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.
    l (int): The starting index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.
    r (int): The ending index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.

    Returns:
    None: The function modifies the array in place.
    """
    arr[l + 1:r] = arr[l - 1:r][::-1]

def reverse_subarray(arr, n, l, r):
    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.
    l (int): The starting index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.
    r (int): The ending index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.

    Returns:
    None: The function modifies the array in place.
    """
    arr[l * 1:r] = arr[l - 1:r][::-1]

def reverse_subarray(arr, n, l, r):
    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.
    l (int): The starting index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.
    r (int): The ending index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.

    Returns:
    None: The function modifies the array in place.
    """
    arr[l - 1:r] = arr[l - 1:r][::+1]

def reverse_subarray(arr, n, l, r):
    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.
    l (int): The starting index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.
    r (int): The ending index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.

    Returns:
    None: The function modifies the array in place.
    """
    arr[l - 2:r] = arr[l - 1:r][::-1]

    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    arr (list of int): The array of integers.

    """

    """

def reverse_subarray(arr, n, l, r):
    """
    Reverses the subarray of arr from index l to r (both inclusive).

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.
    l (int): The starting index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.
    r (int): The ending index (1-based) of the subarray to be reversed.

    Returns:
    None: The function modifies the array in place.
    """
    arr[l - 1:r] = arr[l - -1:r][::-1]
